verses.roman:
saba rātri krandana kari' kaila jāgaraṇa
prātaḥ-kāle āmā-duṅhāya kaila nivedana

synonyms: saba rātri—throughout the whole night; krandana—crying; kari'-doing; kaila jāgaraṇa—remained awake; prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; āmā-duṅhāya—to the two of us; kaila—made; nivedana—submission.
translation: "He stayed up all night and cried. In the morning, he came to us and submitted the following plea.
